data.title: Real Housewives of Atlanta salaries and net worth in 2022
data.meta_description: Numerous viewers have been curious to find out the REAL HOUSEWIVES OF ATLANTA SALARIES. Find out how much the cast members take home and their net worth.
data.text:
The Real Housewives franchise came to being in 2006 and is now in eight cities, following the cancellation of Real Housewives of Washington DC and Real Housewives of Miami. The Real Housewives of Atlanta salaries are a subject of interest to several netizens, given that the show has featured some of the most famous names in the entertainment industry.

Real Housewives of Atlanta premiered in 2008 and has seen several ladies join and leave the show. The Bravo TV enterprise has seen friendships formed and others savoured permanently. RHOA, fully known as Real Housewives of Atlanta salaries and the drama surrounding the cast are a hot discussion among the show's viewers.

Real Housewives of Atlanta salaries and net worth

The women on the show have been known to take home handsome salaries season after season. Many of the RHOA participants have built reputable brands which have remained popular even after their exit. Their wealth has left their followers yearning to find out the housewives of Atlanta salaries.

How much do the Real Housewives of Atlanta make per episode? The highest-paid cast member earns approximately $2.3 million per episode. The figures are reviewed regularly by Bravo TV based on several factors, including show appearances.

How much do the housewives of Atlanta get paid? The participants' salaries depend on the viewership and duration of time held on the series. Here is a list of the RHOA cast in 2021, their salaries and net worth.

1. Cynthia Bailey

Cynthia Bailey hails from Alabama and was born on February 19, 1967. She moved to New York City to venture into the modelling world. She soon signed a five-year contract with Wilhelmina Models. This deal marked the beginning of her appearance in magazines, fashion runways and media campaigns.

The 53-year-old has been part of RHOA since season three in 2010. Cynthia joined the show after much scepticism, describing the show as too dramatic. She only came on board after seeing it as a business opportunity.

Cynthia is also a businesswoman and actress. She runs a modelling school and ''The Bailey Room,'' a wine cellar and event space based in Atlanta. According to Celebrity Net Worth, Cynthia Bailey is worth $2.5 million. Cynthia Bailey salary is an estimated $1.8 million per season.

The star reportedly purchased a home in Atlanta at a whopping $940,000. The house overlooks a small lake in Sandy Springs and boasts six bedrooms and five bathrooms. It sits on one and a half acres. Cynthia refers to her house as ‘'Lake Bailey'’.

2. Porsha Williams

Porsha Williams Stewart is a reality TV actress and model. She was born on June 22, 1981, in Atlanta, Georgia. In pursuit of a modelling career, she featured in music videos as a young adult. Her entrepreneurial spirit saw her start a daycare centre in 2005 when she was 24 years of age.

The eccentric Porsha joined the Real Housewives of Atlanta cast in its fifth season. She featured as a ''Friend of the Housewives'' in the subsequent season after her marriage fell apart.

This event took a toll on her net worth significantly. Porsha has since resumed her duties on season 13 as a leading cast member.

Porsha has been featured in other television series like''Dishi Nation'' as the host, ''The New Celebrity Apprentice,” and “The Apprentice.” The reality queen is also set to release her book, “The Pursuit of Porsha” soon. She is also a co-host on Bravo's chat room alongside Hannah Berner of Summer House and Gizelle Bryant of The Real Housewives of Potomac.

When she is not on set, she runs her two businesses, ''Pampered by Porsha,'' a luxurious sheet line, and ''Go Naked Hair,'' which deals with women's hair extensions and wigs. Her net worth is estimated to be $400,000. Porsha Williams salary per season currently stands at $1.3 million, which is said to be a $500,000 raise from the previous season.

3. Kandi Burruss

Have you been wondering who makes the most money on Atlanta Housewives? Kandi Burruss is believed to be the highest-paid cast member. Her RHOA salary is estimated at $2.3 million per episode.

The RHOA star has been part of the main cast since its second season in 2009. According to Celebrity Net Worth, Kandi Burrus financial worth is $30 million.

Kandi was born on May 17, 1976, in College Park, Georgia. She first appeared on TV at 15 years old on BET's ''Teen Summit.'' She was also part of the music group Xscape, which was famous in the 90s. The singer has also appeared in TV shows like ''Are we there Yet'' and Single Ladies.''

Kandi is also a successful songwriter, having written songs for artists like TLC, Alicia Keys and Destiny's Child. She is also a performing artist and owns her record label. The 44-year-old was also part of ''The Masked Singer'' in 2020.

Burruss also runs ''Kandi Koated Entertainment,'' which sells high-end sex toys. She also owns a chain of restaurants known as ''Old Lady Gang'' in Atlanta.

The music star is living large and owns a posh mansion in Atlanta valued at $1.7 million. She also has a luxury car collection, most notably a Mercedes CL63 AMG valued at $100,000.

4. Kenya Moore

Reality television actress and model Kenya Moore was born on January 24, 1971, in Detroit, Michigan. She began to model as a 15-year-old teenager when she was featured as an Ebony magazine cover girl and a model for an Ebony cosmetic line.

Kenya began contesting in beauty pageants in the early 90s and, at 22 years, bagged the Miss Michigan USA pageant in 1993. She was the second African-American woman to win Miss USA and ranked position five at the Miss Universe title.

Moore also boasts a successful acting career. Some of her appearances include shows like ''The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air,'' ''Living Single'' and ''The Steve Harvey Show.'' She has also appeared in several music videos.

Moore began producing and directing movies in 2007 and owns a production company called ''Moore Vision Media''. The TV star has authored a book, ''Game, Get Some: What Women Really Want,'' which is available on Amazon.

Other business ventures in her name include a hair care product brand, ''Kenya Moore Hair Care'', and a DVD workout called ''Kenya Moore Booty Camp.'' The reality actress boasts a plush home in Atlanta which cost her $500,000.

The dramatic housewife has been on RHOA since season five in 2012. Celebrity Net Worth estimates her value at $800,000. Sources claim that the RHOA veteran took a pay cut from $1.5 million to her current pay, which is $500,000 per season. This means that Kenya Moore salary per episode is approximately $27,000.

5. Drew Sidora

Drew Sidora is the latest addition to the RHOA cast. She made her debut in December 2020, a decision which she was hesitant to at first. The singer and actress was born in Chicago, Illinois, on 1st May 1985 and appeared in her first movie, 'Divas,' when she was only nine years old.

She has appeared in more than 22 TV shows, including "The Howie Mandel Show," "What I Like About You," "Without a Trace," "White Chicks," ''Step Up,'' and 'Girlfriends.' Her recurring role on "That's So Raven" boosted her popularity significantly. The housewife is currently working on her maiden solo album, but she has already released a few hit singles like ''Juke It'' (2010).

Drew Sidora is worth $1.5 million, according to Celebrity Net Worth. She is married to an American consultant and IT advisor, Ralph Pittman, valued at $800,000.

The actress is also an entrepreneur and philanthropist. She founded her charity organization, 'Dreammakers,' a vocal crusader for girls and women.

As the online world continues to follow the Real Housewives of Atlanta salaries, the TV series continues to entertain its viewers as they host different women. The Real Housewives franchises have grown to be a vital part of the entertainment industry in America and serve as an opportunity for the participating women to turn their fame into fortune.

Tuko.co.ke recently published the story of Monique Samuels, who is famed for her role on The Real Housewives of Potomac. Monique is married to former National Football League (NFL) player Chirs Samuels, and together, they have three children. She is passionate about self-care and is also involved in charity work alongside her husband.

Monique is free-spirited and candid and has earned herself fans and foes due to her ability to speak her mind on the show without fear of contradiction. Apart from being a reality TV star, Mrs Samuels is also a musician, entrepreneur, and author. She is valued at $4 million.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
